title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 830.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 830.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part sets forth procedures for the assessment of
penalties for an employer's failure to correct a violation of Labor Law, section 27-a, or a safety and health standard or regulation promulgated under

Labor Law, section 27-a, by the abatement date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
830.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
